SEARCH
Package edu.carroll.initMusic.web.controller

Class PlaylistController

java.lang.Object
edu.carroll.initMusic.web.controller.PlaylistController
@Controller public class PlaylistController extends Object
This controller handles the playlist page, which is where users can do things like look at their playlists and add/remove playlists.
